title: F
data:
==Commands==
*Pressing '''f''' will [[Fire (command)|fire]] your quivered item.
*Pressing '''F''' will allow you to [[Fire (command)|fire]] a specific item in your inventory.
*Pressing '''CTRL''' + '''f''' will allow you to access the in-game find/search engine in order to locate an object anywhere you have already visited.

==Symbols==
While playing in console mode:
*'''f''' represents a [[fungus]]-type monster.
*'''F''' represents a [[List of reptiles and amphibians#Amphibians|frog]]-type monster.
